item.title: ConservationPA Scorecard Map
item.description: The Pennsylvania Environmental Scorecard rates each member of the State Senate and House on their environmental voting record using the most crucial environmental votes that the Pennsylvania General Assembly took during the current legislative session.

item.title: Healthy Campaign
item.description: Healthy Campaign was founded by Marjorie Roswell, a nutrition educator and progressive activist.

item.title: Healthy Campaign Course
item.description: Take the Healthy Campaign Course! Participants in this training will have permanent access to:

item.title: Healthy Campaign Toolkit
item.description: Twenty pages of succinct guidance on healthy eating even when you are super-busy striving to save the world!

item.title: New Jersey League of Conservation Voters Scorecard
item.description: New Jersey LCVâ€™s Environmental Scorecard rates each member of the New Jersey Senate and Assembly on their conservation record and actions taken to protect the environment in the Garden State.

item.title: SugarWars.org
item.description: It is a period of refined sugar. Rebel agents share conclusions drawn from research, with hopes of saving the people, and restoring health freedom to the galaxy.
